required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fosrenol Post-marketing Surveillance for Continuous Cyclic Peritoneal Dialysis in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Fosrenol (Investigation for Patients With Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a regulatory post marketing surveillance in Japan, and it is a local prospective and observational study of patients in continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis (CAPD) who have received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia. The objective of this study is to assess safety and efficacy of using Fosrenol in clinical practice. This study is also all case investigation of which the enrollment period is one year, and all patients in CAPD who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia will be recruited and followed one year.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subjects who received Fosrenol
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse events in subjects who received Fosrenol
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subpopulation with baseline data [such as demographic data, concomitant disease, duration of treatment, maximum daily dose] and dose of Fosrenol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness evaluation assessment [achievement rate of a goal phosphate level; 3.5-6 mg/dL]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness evaluation assessment [achievement rate of a goal calcium level; 8.4-10.0 mg/dL]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical test value collections [calciotropic hormones, bone turnover markers]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 1 year

intervention.description: Patients in CAPD who have received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia

study_pop.textblock: This study is all case investigation of which the enrollment period is one year, and all patients in CAPD who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia will be recruited.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label
